summary: A group of strangers become entrapped in a cave after it collapses. A fugitive among them claims a hostage as leverage for means of escape.
cast: Dennis Cole|Susan Sullivan|Leslie Nielsen|Julie Sommars|Sheila Larken|Lonny Chapman|James Olson|Ray Milland|Ivan Bonar|David Westberg|Todd Martin|Joseph Della Sorte|William Bryant|Michael Masters
title: Cave In!
